entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:57 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning near noon. Wind becoming north 30 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:57 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 25.
